entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:36 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 11:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -16.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -20.6°C
Wind: WNW 24 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to flurries this evening and ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then light before morning. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
